Package com.agenarisk.api.model.interfaces

Interface IdContainer<E extends Exception>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of Exception thrown on error
All Known Implementing Classes:
Model, Network
public interface IdContainer<E extends Exception>
Classes that have a collection of some identifiable objects that have a unique ID should implement this.
Author:
Eugene Dementiev

  • Method Details

    • getIdMap

      Map<Id,? extends Identifiable> getIdMap(Class<? extends Identifiable> idClassType) throws E
      Returns the map of identifiable items based on.
      Parameters:
      idClassType - the class of identifiable object
      Returns:
      ID-Identifiable map
      Throws:
      E - if no collection of type idClassType is registered with the implementing class

    • throwIdExistsException

      void throwIdExistsException(String id) throws E
      Throws an Exception with message e.g. "Object with id `id` already exists", localised for the implementing class.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the existing object
      Throws:
      E - when invoked

    • throwOldIdNullException

      void throwOldIdNullException(String id) throws E
      Throws an Exception with message e.g. "No such object or old ID is null", localised for the implementing class.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the existing object
      Throws:
      E - when invoked

    • changeContainedId

      @Deprecated default <I extends Identifiable> boolean changeContainedId(I identifiable, String id) throws E
      Deprecated.
      For internal use only. You will break referential integrity by using this method directly.
      Changes the ID of the Identifiable in some mapped reference of the IDContainer.
      Does not actually modify Identifiable, which should be done externally.
      Type Parameters:
      I - Type of the identifiable object
      Parameters:
      identifiable - the object which ID needs updating
      id - new ID
      Returns:
      true if ID was changed and false if Identifiable is not contained in the map
      Throws:
      E - if ID already taken
